text.section:
An installment sale agreement shall:
State the full name, place of residence, and post office address of each party to it;
State the date when signed by the buyer; and
Contain a clear description of the goods sold sufficient to identify them readily.

In addition to the items in subsections (a) and (b) of this section, the installment sale agreement shall:
State clearly any collateral security taken for the buyer's obligation under it; and
Contain the following notice in 12-point bold type or larger, directly above the space reserved in the agreement for the signature of the buyer:

A seller may not be deemed to be making loans for purposes of § 11-301(b)(6)(i) of the Financial Institutions Article merely by engaging in activities described in subsection (b)(4)(ii) of this section.
